name: always_hungry
description: if going to throw, 1 in 1d6 bites player

name: animosity
description: if going to pass to another race 1 in 1d6 don't

name: ball_n_chain
description: 1d3 to determine direction to move, no dodge needed

name: bone_head
description: 1 in 1d6 to lose action and zones

name: chainsaw
description: 2d6+3 to hurt, 1 in 1d6 before to hurt itself

name: hypnotic_gaze
description: agility with -1 to disarm an oponent

name: really_stupid
description: 1d6 to lose torn, 1 if nearby allies, 1-3 if alone

name: regeneration
description: 4-6 to not get injured and move to reserve

name: stunty
description: always +1 to dodge, +1 to self injuries

name: wild_animal
description: 1 in 1d6 loses action if going to hit, 1-3 if only move
